name: Capital Direct Funding
overview:
Capital Direct Funding a direct private commercial lender based in Houston Texas. Capital Direct Funding delivers customized hard money loans and financing programs for business owners, developers, investors and commercial real estate professionals domestic and international.

Capital Direct Funding Hard Money’s reputation in the industry is unmatched and they are known far and wide as the company that can be trusted to provide the best overall client experience. The reputation for honesty and integrity stems from the decades of work the executives at the company have done to build relationships with brokers and clients at every level. Their attention to detail and solutions they provide have been noticed by even those who are competitors or who don’t work directly with the firm. Capital Direct Funding Hard Money executives never lose sight of the value of their reputation and are consistently letting clients and industry leader know just how appreciative they are to be so well respected. They do this by continuing to provide the same level of service that is grounded in honesty, integrity and trust.

external_links.title: Capital Direct Funding Recognized as the Most Trusted Global Leader in Direct Commercial Private Lending
